title: Home Screen Font Color?
content: Hi, I want to use this photo for my wallpaper (which I downloaded from somewhere else) but the font color for the date and time doesnt show up well and is hard to see. I've looked all over my phone but can't seem to figure out how to change the color of the text. Does anyone know? Thanks in advance!
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3a XL
